S02ekmuhr_u:4: ñ1.2 atha khalv āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisa[ttvo] mahāsattvo 'nekavidyādharakoṭīniyutaśatasaha[sreṇa] parivṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasamakrāmad
S02ekmuhr_u:5: ñ1.3 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā\var{#kṛtvā\lem \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:7: ñ1.4 idaṃ mama bhagavann ekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayam ekādaśabhi[x] [kalpako]ṭībhir bhāṣitam /
S02ekmuhr_u:9_0: cet tarhi \Dutt} bhāṣiṣyāmi sarva[sattvānā]m arthāya hitāya sukhāya sarvavyādhipraśa[ma]nāya{ḥ}
S02ekmuhr_u:12: samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyā[ḥ] prajāyā,
S02ekmuhr_u:13: yad anena hṛdayena rakṣe kṛte paritre parigra[he śā]ntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare śastraparihare viṣadūṣaṇe\var{viṣa[dūṣa]ṇe \em \Hidas;
S02ekmuhr_u:14: viṣa[prahā]ṇe \em\Dutt} kṛte yaḥ kaś cid atikrame[n] na praśame[n],
S02ekmuhr_u:16: sthāpya paurāṇāṃ karma vipacyat[e] tad asya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
S02ekmuhr_u:17: ñ1.8 sarvabuddhastutaḥ samanvāhṛto 'yaṃ hṛdaya[ṃ]. sarvatathāgatānumodito 'yaṃ hṛdayaṃ\var{hṛdayaṃ\lem \em; hṛdaye \cod}/
S02ekmuhr_u:18: ñ1.9 smarāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃ gaṅgānadībālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍā\var{#cūḍā#\lem \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:25: saha pratilaṃbhe[na] daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatā[ḥ] sumukhībhūtā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhāḥ /
S02ekmuhr_u:26: ñ1.11 evaṃ bahukaro 'yaṃ mā\ill*hṛdayaṃ tasmāt tarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ sādhayitavya{ṇa}m /
S02ekmuhr_u:28: ñ1.12 kālyam\var{kālyam\lem \cod; kalyam \Dutt} utthāya aṣṭo[t]taraṃ vāraśataṃ pravartayitavyam /
S02ekmuhr_u:29: ñ1.13 dṛṣṭadharmikā guṇā daśa parigrahīyāḥ\var{parigrahīyāḥ\lem \cod; parigrahītavyāḥ\Dutt \em} /
S02ekmuhr_u:38: ñ1.20 [6] na viṣaṃ na garam na jvaraṃ na śastram kāye kramiṣyati /
S02ekmuhr_u:41: ñ1.23 [9] nākālamṛtyunā kālaṃ\var{kālaṃ\lem \cod; kālaṃ ca \Dutt} kariṣyati /
S02ekmuhr_u:42: %NB number 10 seems to be missing, or a different counting is required
S02ekmuhr_u:47: ñ1.28 [4] itaś c[y]utaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyate
S02ekmuhr_u:48: smarāmy ahaṃ bhagavann it daśānāṃ gaṅgānadībāl[u]kāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato 'bhūt{a} /
S02ekmuhr_u:51: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sarvabuddhānāṃ\var{sarvabuddhānāṃ\conj \Nagashima;
S02ekmuhr_u:55_0: yena \cod} bandhanabaddhā ye vadhyaprāptā\var{ye\rarr badhyaprāptā repeated \dittography
S02ekmuhr_u:55_1: \cod} ye udakāgnivividhaduḥkhābhyāhatā[ḥ] tad anenāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ trāṇam
S02ekmuhr_u:60: mahārdhiko \Dutt} 'yaṃ mama bhagavat hṛ[dayam] ekavelāṃ prakāśitvā catvāro mūlāpattayaḥ kṣa[yaṃ] gacchanti\var{gacchanti\lem \Dutt; gakṣanti \cod} .
S02ekmuhr_u:63: % Dutt supplies ``teṣāṃ ye'' but better understand: ``why say more,
S02ekmuhr_u:64: these will happen as they are taught''
S02ekmuhr_u:67: #mūlaṃ bhaviṣyati \Dutt} ye śroṣyanti prāk- eva japa-sādhana-ādibhiḥ /

S02ekmuhr_u:72: ``should be caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ''.} mām- uddiśya- upavasante\var{upavasante \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:75: tena nā[madhe]yam- api grahaṇena bhagavan- saha sas- ayam- buddha-koṭī-niyuta-śata-sahasra-atireka-samam /
S02ekmuhr_u:79: teṣām- eva kara-tala-gatā- buddha-bodhis- bhaviṣyati /\marginpar{\Dutt p.39}
S02ekmuhr_u:81: sādhu sādhu kula-putra yat te\var{yat te\lem \cod;

S02ekmuhr_u:96: oṃ diri diri\var{diri diri\lem \em; dhara dhara dhiri dhiri \Dutt from Tib} /
S02ekmuhr_u:101: [kusume]\var{kusume\em supplied from Tib also in Chinese} kusumavare /
S02ekmuhr_u:106: tat- yathā ha ha ha ha\var{ha ha ha ha\lem \cod; hā [hā hā] hā \Dutt} /
S02ekmuhr_u:107: ime tile cile bhile khile svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:110: \com{abhyukṣipaṇa-\lem BHS for abhyukṣaṇa- or confused with \dhatu{kṣip-}.}
S02ekmuhr_u:113: tat- yathā ṭuru ṭuru ha ha ha ha\var{ha ha ha ha\lem \cod; hā hā hā hā \Dutt} svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:117: tat- yathā siri siri dhiri dhiri siri dhiri\var{siri siri \lem \em based on Chinese;
S02ekmuhr_u:122: tat- yathā sāde sāde / sidi sidi / sudu sudu svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:127: yasi \Dutt}ddhasi cari huru icuruḥ suruḥ suru\var{suru\lem \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:131: jñātinaṣṭais \Dutt} agnim- prajvālya dadhi-madhu-ghṛta-abhyaktānām- ahorātra-uṣitena- ekena triṃśatā homa[s-] kāryaḥ /
S02ekmuhr_u:135: tat- yathā ili mili pili\var{pili\lem from Chinese; \omitted \Dutt} tili / tili hili svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:137: dīpābaddha \Dutt} udakena sarṣapair vā\var{sarṣapair vā\lem \em \Nagashima based on Chinese} bhasmanā vā sapta-jāpena /
S02ekmuhr_u:140: tat- yathā piṭi piṭi tiṭi tiṭi /
S02ekmuhr_u:142: siṭi siṭi viṭi viṭi Chinese} viṭi gaccha gaccha bhagavan-\var{bhagavan\lem \em (illegible in photo)
